snippet: A Florida lifeguard fired for breaking a rule while trying to rescue someone has been offered his job back, but says he does not want it.
abstract: Tomas Lopez, Miami lifeguard who was fired after rescuing a swimmer, refuses to be reinstated at his job; private lifeguard company fired Lopez for leaving his beach zone to perform the rescue, posing a potential liability problem; incident set off a furor in social media, causing the company to offer Lopez his job back.
lead_paragraph: A Florida lifeguard fired for breaking a rule while trying to rescue someone has been offered his job back, but says he does not want it.

headline.main: Lifeguard Says He Chose Saving Man Over Saving Job
headline.print_headline: Lifeguard Says He Chose Saving Man Over Saving Job
